alert.note: Alert for Beaverhead and Western Madison below 6000ft; Gallatin and Madison County Mountains and Centennial Mountains; Madison River Valley; Ruby Mountains and Southern Beaverhead Mountains (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 17 at 7:59PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...Gusty winds from thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Madison and southeastern Beaverhead Counties through 845 PM MDT... At 758 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking thunderstorms along a line extending from 11 miles south of Virginia City to 11 miles northeast of Lima. Movement was east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Virginia City, Ennis, Alder, Jeffers and Cameron. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
